content.question: A person exerts an upward force on a box, as shown above. The box may be moving upward, downward, or not at all while the person exerts the upward force. For which of the following motions of the box is the work done by the person on the box correctly indicated?

choices.label: Motion of Box Work Done by Person on Box No motion Positive
Motion of Box Work Done by Person on Box Upward with decreasing speed Negative
Motion of Box Work Done by Person on Box Downward with constant speed Zero
Motion of Box Work Done by Person on Box Downward with increasing speed Negative

content.answer: Motion of Box Work Done by Person on Box Downward with increasing speed Negative

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
